ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.Trinket.Pictures

Class PictureDirectoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.trinkettrader.Inventory.Trinket.Pictures.PictureDirectoryManager

  • public class PictureDirectoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the directory on the device's memory used to store pictures in this app.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PictureDirectoryManager(android.app.Activity activity)
      Creates a new PictureDirectoryManager from an android activity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File compressPicture(java.io.File infile)
      Compresses a picture to under 65536 bytes and stores it in the application's pictures directory.
      java.io.File compressPicture(java.lang.String filename, android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      Compresses a picture to under 65536 bytes and stores it in the application's pictures directory.
      java.io.File compressPicture(java.lang.String filename, byte[] pictureByteArray)
      Compresses a picture to under 65536 bytes and stores it in the application's pictures directory.
      Picture loadPicture(java.lang.String name)
      Loads a picture from the application's directory and returns it.
